best: What is the one of the single best experiences of {PARK_NAME}?
hidden_gem: What is a hidden gem of {PARK_NAME}?
schedule: Please provide a detailed itinerary for {PARK_NAME} for 6 nights. Do not reply with line breaks. The itinerary must include overnight details, park entrance details, parking details, trail names & hike duration. If the park is too small for 6 nights, for example a park then can be done entirely in 1 day, it is okay if the schedule reflects that & is less than 6 nights.
camping: What is the one of the best camping trails in {PARK_NAME}? Include parking details, whether a reservation is necessary, hike duration & why is this trail is good for camping?
tips: What are some unique advice/tips for {PARK_NAME}?
busy: What are the most crowded months to visit {PARK_NAME}?
toughest: I am in great physical shape. What is one of the toughest hikes in {PARK_NAME} that is lesser known? Include hike duration & specific details for why this hike is demanding.
